pullRequest.title: Update release notes for milestone 2
pullRequest.bodyText:
Updated to include HotSpot compatibility options, JITServer
tech preview and the removal of a Javadoc issue.
Signed-off-by: Sue Chaplain sue_chaplain@uk.ibm.com

nodes.bodyText: This one can also be removed.
nodes.diffHunk: @@ -142,13 +153,6 @@ The v0.18 release contains the following known issues and limitations: Manual builds on other platforms are possible by following our detailed build instructions. -#897 -Javadoc not building some OpenJ9 extensions. -All platforms (OpenJDK 8 only) -Some API documentation is missing in the build/<platform>/docs directory. -None - - #898

nodes.bodyText: There is an extra .0 here now.
nodes.diffHunk: @@ -142,24 +153,10 @@ The v0.18 release contains the following known issues and limitations: Manual builds on other platforms are possible by following our detailed build instructions. -#897 -Javadoc not building some OpenJ9 extensions. -All platforms (OpenJDK 8 only) -Some API documentation is missing in the build/<platform>/docs directory. -None - - -#898 -Javadoc building some unsupported OpenJ9 extensions. -All platforms (OpenJDK 8 only) -Some API documentation in build/<platform>/docs is not supported with OpenJ9. -None - - ## Other changes -A full commit history for this release is available at [Eclipse OpenJ9 v0.18.0](https://github.com/eclipse/openj9/releases/tag/openj9-0.18.0). +A full commit history for this release is available at [Eclipse OpenJ9 v0.18.0.0](https://github.com/eclipse/openj9/releases/tag/openj9-0.18.0).
